39 #include <moveit/task_constructor/stages/modify_planning_scene.h>
40 #include <moveit/task_constructor/storage.h>
41 #include <moveit/planning_scene/planning_scene.h>

43 namespace moveit {
44 namespace task_constructor {
45 namespace stages {
46 
47 ModifyPlanningScene::ModifyPlanningScene(const std::string& name) : PropagatingEitherWay(name) {}
48 
49 void ModifyPlanningScene::attachObjects(const Names& objects, const std::string& attach_link, bool attach) {
50  auto it_inserted = attach_objects_.insert(std::make_pair(attach_link, std::make_pair(Names(), attach)));
51  Names& o = it_inserted.first->second.first;
52  o.insert(o.end(), objects.begin(), objects.end());
53 }
54 
55 void ModifyPlanningScene::addObject(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object) {
56  if (collision_object.operation != moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD) {
57  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("ModifyPlanningScene", name() << ": addObject is called with object's operation not set "
58  "to ADD -- ignoring the object");
59  return;
60  }
61  collision_objects_.push_back(collision_object);
62 }
63 
64 void ModifyPlanningScene::removeObject(const std::string& object_name) {
65  moveit_msgs::CollisionObject obj;
66  obj.id = object_name;
67  obj.operation = moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::REMOVE;
68  collision_objects_.push_back(obj);
69 }
70 
71 void ModifyPlanningScene::allowCollisions(const Names& first, const Names& second, bool allow) {
72  collision_matrix_edits_.push_back(CollisionMatrixPairs({ first, second, allow }));
73 }
74 
75 void ModifyPlanningScene::allowCollisions(const std::string& first, const moveit::core::JointModelGroup& jmg,
76  bool allow) {
77  const auto& links = jmg.getLinkModelNamesWithCollisionGeometry();
78  if (!links.empty())
79  allowCollisions(Names({ first }), links, allow);
80 }
81 
82 void ModifyPlanningScene::computeForward(const InterfaceState& from) {
83  sendForward(from, apply(from, false), SubTrajectory());
84 }
85 
86 void ModifyPlanningScene::computeBackward(const InterfaceState& to) {
87  sendBackward(apply(to, true), to, SubTrajectory());
88 }
89 
90 void ModifyPlanningScene::attachObjects(planning_scene::PlanningScene& scene,
91  const std::pair<std::string, std::pair<Names, bool> >& pair, bool invert) {
92  moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject obj;
93  obj.link_name = pair.first;
94  bool attach = pair.second.second;
95  if (invert)
96  attach = !attach;
97  obj.object.operation =
98  attach ? (int8_t)moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD : (int8_t)moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::REMOVE;
99  for (const std::string& name : pair.second.first) {
100  obj.object.id = name;
101  scene.processAttachedCollisionObjectMsg(obj);
102  }
103 }
104 
105 void ModifyPlanningScene::allowCollisions(planning_scene::PlanningScene& scene, const CollisionMatrixPairs& pairs,
106  bool invert) {
107  collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm = scene.getAllowedCollisionMatrixNonConst();
108  bool allow = invert ? !pairs.allow : pairs.allow;
109  if (pairs.second.empty()) {
110  for (const auto& name : pairs.first)
111  acm.setEntry(name, allow);
112  } else
113  acm.setEntry(pairs.first, pairs.second, allow);
114 }
115 
116 // invert indicates, whether to detach instead of attach (and vice versa)
117 // as well as to forbid instead of allow collision (and vice versa)
118 InterfaceState ModifyPlanningScene::apply(const InterfaceState& from, bool invert) {
119  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr scene = from.scene()->diff();
120  InterfaceState result(scene);
121  // add/remove objects
122  for (const auto& collision_object : collision_objects_)
123  processCollisionObject(*scene, collision_object);
124 
125  // attach/detach objects
126  for (const auto& pair : attach_objects_)
127  attachObjects(*scene, pair, invert);
128 
129  // allow/forbid collisions
130  for (const auto& pairs : collision_matrix_edits_)
131  allowCollisions(*scene, pairs, invert);
132 
133  if (callback_)
134  callback_(scene, properties());
135 
136  return result;
137 }
138 
139 void ModifyPlanningScene::processCollisionObject(planning_scene::PlanningScene& scene,
140  const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& object) {
141  scene.processCollisionObjectMsg(object);
142 }
143 } // namespace stages
144 } // namespace task_constructor
145 } // namespace moveit
